attributes.action: Start Point Based System for Everyone inc. EU to Work, Study and Live in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
According to BBC, there are now more than 800 Indian-owned businesses in the UK, employing more than 110,000 people.
Link: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-34787765

Students, Workers and Business People around the World,they have to Prove Eligibility of English Language and Fund.

So Why not Same Eligibility Criteria for the EU People ?

We want:
1. Equality for Immigration Rules
2. Same Eligibility for all Nationals
3. Same Work and Study Rules for all nationals

Bring PBS for All Nationals.
attributes.background: In the UK only, More than 800 Indian Companies are Recruited more than 110000 British Employees. And Many Doctors, Software Developers and Bright Students from All Over the World need to Pay Visa cost to Enter UK,So Why should EU People [Many Can't speak English] can live without any Qualification ?
